name: Beefender (itch)
description:
Entry for the 48 hour minibeansjam 2018.

You're playing a queen bee defending her nest from their natural enemy the hornet. Try to defend your nest from 48 hornets without getting hit to win the game.

SFX & music: U-GameZ

Mini-Review über Beefender von Dima und Andreas auf Rocket Beans TV
